<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Visiting students</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>Study here as a student from another university</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="section tabs">










    <script type="text/javascript">
	$ = jQuery;
	$(document).ready(function() {
	    $('#tabs a:first').tab('show');
	    var hash = window.location.hash;
	    if (hash == undefined || hash == ""){
	      var previouslyActive = getCookie("concordia-component-tab-active-tab");
          if (previouslyActive != undefined) hash = previouslyActive;
	    }
	    hash && $('ul.nav a[href="' + hash + '"]').tab('show');

	    $('.nav-tabs a').click(function (e) {
	        $(this).tab('show');
	        var scrollmem = $('body').scrollTop();
	        window.location.hash = this.hash;
	        $('html,body').scrollTop(scrollmem);
	        setCookie("concordia-component-tab-active-tab", this.hash, 1);
	    });
	});
        /** COOKIE GETTER AND SETTER FUNCTIONS **/
    function setCookie(c_name,value,exdays){
        var exdate=new Date();
        exdate.setDate(exdate.getDate() + exdays);
        var c_value=escape(value) + ((exdays==null) ? "" : "; expires="+exdate.toUTCString());
        document.cookie=c_name + "=" + c_value;
    }
    function getCookie(c_name){
      var c_value=document.cookie;
      var c_start=c_value.indexOf(" " + c_name + "=");
      if (c_start == -1)	{
        c_start=c_value.indexOf(c_name + "=");
      }
      if (c_start == -1){
        c_value=null;
      } else {
        c_start=c_value.indexOf("=", c_start) + 1;
        var c_end=c_value.indexOf(";", c_start);
        if (c_end == -1){
          c_end=c_value.length;
        }
        c_value=unescape(c_value.substring(c_start,c_end));
      }
      return c_value;
    }
	</script>
	
	<div class="c-tabs">
    
	    <ul class="nav nav-tabs" id="tabs">
	        
		          <li><a href="#undergraduate" data-toggle="tab">Undergraduate</a></li>
		        
	        
		          <li><a href="#graduate" data-toggle="tab">Graduate</a></li>
		        
	        
	    </ul>
	    <div class="tab-content">
	        <div class="tab-pane" id="undergraduate">
	           
	           <div class="parsys parsys-tabs-0">


<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase section reference"><div style="display:inline;" class="cq-dd-paragraph"><div class="parbase wysiwyg">



<div class="rte">
<p>You may <b>apply for visiting student status</b> if:</p>
<ul>
<li>You are an undergraduate student from another university who has <b>written approval</b> from your home university to take courses at Concordia University, or</li>
<li>You are a student currently registered in a professional program sponsored by external associations, such as the CA, CMA or CGA. &nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<p><a adhocenable="false" href="/students/birks.html">Contact the Birks Student Service Centre</a>&nbsp;to apply for visiting student status. <b>Please note:</b> being granted visiting student status in no way guarantees you a place in a Concordia course.</p>
<h3><span style="font-size: 18px;"><a name="qc"></a>Visiting students from Quebec universities</span></h3>
<p>If you are a student from another Quebec university who wishes to take courses at Concordia, you must complete a web-based <a adhocenable="false" href="https://dbs.crepuq.qc.ca/mobilite-cours/4DSTATIC/ENAccueil.html" target="_blank">Inter-University Exchange Authorization form</a>&nbsp;on the CREPUQ website. Once you complete the CREPUQ form, your application will be <a adhocenable="false" href="http://registrar.concordia.ca/calendar/16/16.html#b16.1.7">handled online</a>.&nbsp;</p>
<h3><span style="font-size: 18px;"><a name="can"></a>Visiting students from universities outside Quebec</span></h3>
<p>If you are an undergraduate student from a university outside the province of Quebec who wishes to take courses at Concordia, you must send us:</p>
<ul>
<li>A <b>letter of permission</b> from the registrar of your home university</li>
<li><b>Canadian citizenship/permanent residency</b> documents or a <b><a adhocenable="false" href="http://www.immigration-quebec.gouv.qc.ca/en/immigrate-settle/students/index.html" target="_blank">Quebec Certificate of Acceptance</a></b> (CAQ) and/or <b>student visa</b>.</li>
</ul>
<p>You may be eligible to pay Quebec rates of tuition if you are a <b>Canadian</b> or <b>Permanent Resident</b>.</p>
<ul>
<li>Include <b></b><b><a adhocenable="false" href="/students/birks/identity-documents.html">proof of Quebec residency</a></b>&nbsp;in your visiting student application to be eligible for Quebec tuition rates.</li>
</ul>
<h3><span style="font-size: 18px;"><a name="int"></a>Visiting international students&nbsp;</span></h3>
<p>If you are an international student who wishes to take courses at Concordia, <a adhocenable="false" href="http://international.concordia.ca/students/exchangeprograms/studentsfromabroad/visitinginternationalfeepayingstudents/">please visit Concordia International</a>, where you will find a full guide on how to attend Concordia as a <b>visiting international fee-paying student</b>.&nbsp;</p>
<p><b>Canadian visas for international students</b></p>
<p><a></a>You must obtain a&nbsp;<b>Quebec Certificate of Acceptance&nbsp;</b>(CAQ) and a&nbsp;<b>Canada Study Permit</b>&nbsp;if you wish to pursue studies in the province of Quebec and you are not a Canadian citizen or a Landed immigrant.</p>
<p>However, you need only apply for a&nbsp;<b>Temporary Resident Visa</b>&nbsp;if:</p>
<ul>
<li><a></a>You reside in a country that requires such a document to enter Canada, and</li>
<li>Your program of study is for&nbsp;<b>six months or less</b>&nbsp;and can be completed within the allowable period of your stay in Canada. Â­</li>
</ul>
<p>In this case, no other document is necessary. Despite this regulation, foreign nationals may still opt to apply for a CAQ and a Study Permit if they wish. You may obtain further information from the Visa Departments of the&nbsp;<i><a href="http://www.international.gc.ca/ciw-cdm/embassies-ambassades.aspx" target="_blank" adhocenable="false">Canadian Consulate and Embassy in your country</a></i>.&nbsp;</p>
<h3><span style="font-size: 18px;">Professional programs sponsored by external associations</span></h3>
<p>If you wish to register for courses required for a program sponsored by an external association or order, such as the accountancy CA, CMA or CGA certifications, you must send us:</p>
<ul>
<li>Proof of membership in the association&nbsp;</li>
<li>Your citizenship documents. Visiting students who are Canadians or Permanent Residents may be eligible to pay Quebec rates of tuition if they submit of proof of Quebec residency in accordance with government criteria.</li>
</ul>
<p><a adhocenable="false" href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/current/sec61/61-140.html#b61.170">Read more about this option</a> in the academic calendar.&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

	        </div>
	        <div class="tab-pane" id="graduate">
	           
	           <div class="parsys parsys-tabs-1">


<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase section reference"><div style="display:inline;" class="cq-dd-paragraph"><div class="parbase wysiwyg">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Graduate-level visiting students</h3>
<p>Graduate visiting students from other universities who have been authorized by their home universities to take graduate courses at Concordia University are subject to the regulations of Concordia University.</p>
<p>The student is responsible for:</p>
<ul>
<li>Contacting the department in which they wish to take Graduate-level courses</li>
<li>Completing and submitting the &quot;<a adhocenable="false" href="/content/dam/concordia/offices/sgs/docs/forms/independentregistration.pdf">Authorization to Resister as a Non-Degree Student&quot; form</a></li>
<li>Submitting proof of degree (diploma and transcripts)</li>
<li>Submitting proof of immigration status (if applicable)</li>
<li>Ensuring they submit the required information/documents to&nbsp;<a href="/offices/birks.html" adhocenable="false">Birks' Student Service Centre</a>&nbsp;for Code Permanent and/or Quebec Residency processing by the Government Reporting Unit.</li>
</ul>
<h3>Canadian visas for international students</h3>
<p>All persons, other than Canadian citizens and Landed immigrants, who wish to pursue their studies in the province of QuÃ©bec, must obtain a&nbsp;<a href="http://www.immigration-quebec.gouv.qc.ca/en/immigrate-settle/students/index.html">QuÃ©bec Certificate of Acceptance</a>&nbsp;(CAQ) and a Canada Study Permit. If your program of study is for<b>six months or less</b>&nbsp;and can be completed within the allowable period of your stay in Canada, you need only apply for a Temporary Resident Visa if you reside in a country that requires such a document to enter Canada, no other document is necessary. Despite the regulation, foreign nationals may still opt to apply for a CAQ and a Study Permit if they wish to get these documents.</p>
<p>Further information may be obtained by the Visa Departments of the&nbsp;<a href="http://www.international.gc.ca/ciw-cdm/embassies-ambassades.aspx?view=d">Canadian Consulate and Embassy in your country</a>.</p>
<p><i>Source: Undergraduate Calendar 2007-2008; Graduate Calendar 2007-2008</i></p>

</div></div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

	        </div>
	    </div>
	</div>
	</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Canadian admission requirements </h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Minimum admission requirements for Canadian applications</h3>
<p>To be admitted as an undergraduate student to Concordia, you must meet certain minimum academic qualifications. What we require from you varies from province to province and depends on your academic background. Meeting these minimum admission requirements does not guarantee admission to Concordia.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="quebec-applicants"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Quebec Cegep students">
					
                    Quebec Cegep students
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="text parbase section"><p>You must complete a two-year pre-university program or a three-year professional DEC (DiplÃ´me d'Ã©tudes collÃ©giales). CRC minimum requirements for admission vary between 19.00 and 30.00; however, based on space and availability students below this average may be considered.</p>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="canadian-applicants"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Other parts of Canada">
					
                    Other parts of Canada
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;">You must be a high school graduate with the following credentials, depending on which province you are from:&nbsp;</p>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;"><b>Alberta</b>: High school diploma with a minimum of five academic courses, numbered 30 or 31, one of which must be English Language Arts 30-1. Also acceptable: Math 30-2 and one 35-level course provided it is a 5-credit course.</p>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;"><b>British Columbia:</b> High school diploma with a minimum of four approved Grade 12 <a adhocenable="false" href="/admissions/undergraduate/requirements-canada.html#academic_subjects">academic subjects</a>, one of which must be English 12. Note: Communications 12 is not acceptable as one of the four required subjects.</p>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;"><b>Manitoba:</b> High school diploma with a minimum of five academic Grade 12 40S courses, one of which must be an ELA Focus 40S. Note: Essential Math 40S is not acceptable as one of the 5 courses.</p>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;"><b>New Brunswick: </b>High school diploma with a minimum of five appropriate Grade 12 academic courses, numbered 120, 121 or 122, one of which must be English 121 or 122.&nbsp;(French 121 or 122 if attending a French secondary school).</p>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;"><b>Newfoundland and Labrador:</b> High school diploma (Honours or Academic Status) with a minimum of five Grade 12 academic courses (i.e. 10 credits), one of which must be English 3201.</p>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;"><b>Northwest Territories:</b>&nbsp; High school diploma with a minimum of five grade 12 academic courses, numbered 30 or 31, one of which must be English Language Arts 30-1. Also acceptable: Math 30-2 and one 35-level course provided it is a 5-credit course.</p>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;"><b>Nova Scotia:</b> High school diploma with a minimum of five appropriate grade 12 (academic or advanced) courses, one of which must be English 12.</p>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;"><b>Nunavut:</b> High school diploma with a minimum of five academic Grade 12 courses, numbered 30 or 31, one of which must be English Language Arts 30-1. Also acceptable: Math 30-2 and one 35-level course provided it is a 5-credit course.</p>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;"><b>Ontario</b>: High school diploma with a minimum of six grade 12U and/or M courses, including English 4U (FranÃ§ais 4U if attending a French secondary school).</p>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;"><b>Prince Edward Island: </b>High school diploma with a minimum of five academic Grade 12 courses numbered 611 or 621, one of which must be English.</p>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;"><b>Saskatchewan</b>: High school diploma with a minimum of five Grade 12 academic courses, two of which must be English Language Arts 30A and English Language Arts 30B.</p>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;"><b>Yukon</b>: High school diploma with a minimum of four approved Grade 12 <a href="/admissions/undergraduate/requirements-canada.html#academic_subjects">academic subjects</a>, one of which must be English 12. Note: Communications 12 is not acceptable as one of the four required subjects.</p>
<hr style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;">

<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;"><b><a name="academic_subjects"></a>Academic subjects for British Columbia &amp; Yukon</b><br>
The following is the list of academic subjects we would accept:</p>
<table border="0" width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
<tbody><tr><td align="left" valign="top" width="50%"><ul>
<li>BC First Nations Studies 12</li>
<li>Biology 12</li>
<li>Calculus 12</li>
<li>Chemistry 12</li>
<li>Comparative Civilization 12</li>
<li>Economics 12</li>
<li>English Literature 12</li>
<li>English 12</li>
<li>FranÃ§ais Langue 12 or French 12<br>
(but not both)</li>
<li>Geography 12</li>
<li>Geology 12</li>
</ul>
</td>
<td align="left" valign="top" width="50%"><ul>
<li>German 12</li>
<li>History 12</li>
<li>Japanese 12</li>
<li>Law 12</li>
<li>Mandarin 12</li>
<li>One of: Principles of Mathematics 12 or Pre-Calculus 12 (but not both) or Foundations of Mathematics 12</li>
<li>Physics 12</li>
<li>Punjabi 12</li>
<li>Spanish 12</li>
</ul>
</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="intl-bac"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open International Baccalaureate">
					
                    International Baccalaureate
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_2" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>You must have an International Baccalaureate diploma with a minimum total of 27 points.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="french-bac"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open French Baccalaureate diplomas">
					
                    French Baccalaureate diplomas
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_4" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>You must have a French Baccalaureate diploma with a minimum overall average of:</p>
<ul>
<li>11/20 â first attempt&nbsp;</li>
<li>12/20 â second attempt</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="home-school"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Home-schooled applicants	">
					
                    Home-schooled applicants	
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_3" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>We treat each home-school case on its own merits. Home-schooled applicants should submit all supporting application documents, e.g. SAT and AP test scores and transcripts, of any academic institution attended. In some cases, an interview(s) with a university official may be required.</p>
<p>You must also include a:</p>
<ul>
<li><b>Description of the home-schooling curriculum</b> program followed and measures of academic acquisition in the program</li>
<li><b>Letter of intent</b> explaining on which basis admission is sought and a letter from the home-educator detailing how the home-school program has prepared the applicant for university studies&nbsp;</li>
<li><b>Letter of recommendation</b> from an impartial source indicating the applicantâs readiness for university-level study.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>Jaymee Shell</h2>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h5>BSc Honours in Exercise Science </h5>
</div></div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h5>Minor in Multidisciplinary Studies in Science</h5>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/admissions/student-profiles/jaymee-shell/jcr:content/content-main/image"><img title="Jaymee-Shell-600x400" alt="Jaymee-Shell-600x400" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/admissions/student-profiles/jaymee-shell/_jcr_content/content-main/image.img.jpg/1375216235582.jpg"></div>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The Exercise Science program, with its small classes and dedicated teaching staff, is the perfect match for Jaymee, who hopes to become a pediatric rheumatologist. âThe professors are really supportive. We learn so much from them because theyâve studied exercise science and have done this before.â?</p>
<p><b>One of her favourite aspects of the program is how it has helped her shape the research skills sheâll need for her future.</b>&nbsp;âIâve had the opportunity to conduct projects in three different disciplines: Psychology, Biology and Exercise Science.â? And, as an honours student, sheâs able to do larger-scale projects: she did research on concussions and conducted a pilot project on dual-tasks and their application to concussion assessment.</p>
<p>In her spare time, Jaymee plays right wing for the Concordia Stingers womenâs hockey team. Balancing her sports and studies is easy because she enjoys them both so much: âConcordia really does have the best combination of athletic and academic excellence.â?</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<h2>Michel Berger</h2>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h5>BComm Major in Finance, Minor in Marketing, Member of the Institute for Co-operative Education</h5>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/admissions/student-profiles/michel-berger/jcr:content/content-main/image"><img title="Michel-Berger" alt="Michel-Berger" class="cq-dd-image" src="/admissions/student-profiles/michel-berger/_jcr_content/content-main/image.img.jpg/1375093735538.jpg"></div>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><p><b>One finance studentâs road to achievement</b></p>
<p>Between the co-op work terms, business case competitions and participation in the Study Abroad program, Michel Berger has quite the impressive resumÃ©. <b>He was excited to study at the John Molson School of Business because of its many opportunities and the chance to bring his hard work and commitment to the table.</b></p>
<p>âThrough my involvement in JMSB, I learned a tremendous amount of practical knowledge not taught in the classroom,â? says Michel. That includes his participation in the prestigious Kenneth Woods Portfolio Management Program, in which a select group of finance students manage a portfolio of $1.5 million in equity under the supervision of industry professionals.</p>
<p>With his high academic standing and a passion for learning, Michel knows that great things lie ahead: âThere are so many interesting and lucrative career paths that JMSB can guide you towards because of its outstanding reputation.â?</p>
</p>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<h5>MFA (studio arts), Faculty of Fine Arts</h5>

<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/admissions/student-profiles/jacynthe-carrier/jcr:content/content-main/image"><img title="j_carrier-600x400" alt="j_carrier-600x400" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/admissions/student-profiles/jacynthe-carrier/_jcr_content/content-main/image.img.jpg/1375214875191.jpg"></div>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Jacynthe wanted to have the time, space and resources to concentrate on her research, and chose Concordia for the impressive facilities of its renowned Photography program. Her work, which uses photography and video to examine relationships between the body and the environment, has earned several major distinctions: Prix Ã  la crÃ©ation artistique by the Conseil des arts et des lettres du QuÃ©bec, inclusion in the 2011 Quebec Triennial exhibition at the MusÃ©e dâart contemporain de MontrÃ©al; Dick and Gretchen Evans Fellowship, awarded to an outstanding photography student in his or her final year of the MFA in Studio Arts.</p>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>Javad Lavaei</h2>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h5>MASc, Electrical and Computer Engineering, 2006 Faculty of Engineering and Computer Science</h5>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/admissions/student-profiles/javad-lavaei/jcr:content/content-main/image"><img title="Javad-Lavaei-600x400" alt="Javad-Lavaei-600x400" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/admissions/student-profiles/javad-lavaei/_jcr_content/content-main/image.img.jpg/1375215935840.jpg"></div>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Javad found Concordia ideal for pursuing his research interests. Under the guidance of Dr. Amir Aghdam, he had international success working in the area of control systems. Javad won the Governor Generalâs Gold Medal, awarded every year to Concordiaâs most outstanding graduate student, and the Northeastern Association of Graduate Schools Masterâs Thesis Award. He was named a âNew Face of Engineeringâ? by the National Engineers Week Foundation, which recognizes students aged 30 or younger who have shown outstanding abilities and leadership. Javad obtained a PhD from the California Institute of Technology and is now an assistant professor at Columbia University in New York.</p>
<p>Awards: Concordia University International Tuition Fee Remission Award (September 2005-April 2006) Concordia University Partial Tuition Scholarship for International Students (May 2006 to Aug 2006) Power Corporation of Canada Graduate Fellowship (September 2006 to April 2007) Governor General Gold Medal Award (June Convocation 2008).</p>

</div></div>


</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

			jQuery(document).ready(function() {
                var c_carousel = jQuery('.carousel');

				// Instantiate the carousel
			    c_carousel.carousel({ interval: 10000, pause:'hover' });

                jQuery('.c_controls a').bind('click touch', function(e) {
                    $parent = jQuery(this).parent();
                    if ($parent.hasClass('play')) { // We need to play
                        c_carousel.carousel('cycle');
                        $parent.removeClass('play').addClass('pause');
            
                    } else { // We need to pause
                        c_carousel.carousel('pause');
                        $parent.removeClass('pause').addClass('play');
                    }
            
                    e.preventDefault();
                });

                // Instantiate the popovers.
                jQuery('.carousel-indicators li').popover({ trigger: "hover", placement: "top", html: "true" });
                jQuery('.carousel-indicators li:not(.c_controls)').bind('click touch', function(){ c_carousel.carousel('pause'); });
            
                // hide center blurbs when pop-overs are activated
                jQuery('.carousel-indicators li:not(.c_controls)').hover(
                    function(e) {
                        jQuery('.carousel-inner .item.active p').stop().fadeOut('fast');
                    },
                    function(e) {
                        jQuery('.carousel-inner .item.active p').stop().fadeIn('slow');
                    }	    
                );
			});

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Alumni Services Partners</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Earnings from these partnerships are re-invested in our alumni and students through scholarships and bursaries, library services, the mentor program, career advising, activities, events and networking opportunities. <a href="/alumni-friends/about-us/partners-and-sponsors.html" adhocenable="false">Become a partner</a>.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt5"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt5-c0 span3"><div class="tiles section">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="page-header parbase section"> 






<div class="c-intro row">
    <h1 class="span8 section-header">Choose Concordians</h1>

    
    <div class="span8">
        <p>Are you recruiting? Look to your alma mater for talented candidates.</p>

    </div>
	<div class="span4"><div id="cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/alumni-friends/benefits-services/career-services/choose-concordians/jcr:content/content-main/page_header"><img title="choose-concordians-450px" alt="choose-concordians-450px" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/alumni-friends/benefits-services/career-services/choose-concordians/_jcr_content/content-main/page_header/image.img.jpg/1375095322446.jpg"></div>
        </div>
</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt1"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt1-c0 span9"><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The Choose Concordians initiative encourages alumni to support their alma mater by hiring fellow Concordians. It links employers, on-campus recruiters and Concordiaâs career centers and boosts employment and internship opportunities for our graduates and students.</p>
<h2>Why Choose Concordians?</h2>
<p>As alumni, you know the value of the Concordia experience. Our graduates are dynamic, socially engaged and eager to put their knowledge and skills to work for a better world.</p>
<p>Through Concordia's career centres, employers have access to:</p>
<ul>
<li>Job posting services</li>
<li>On-campus career fairs and networking events</li>
<li>Work-study interns (Employers may qualify for tax credits through Concordiaâs Co-op program.)</li>
<li>Personalized service</li>
</ul>
<p>Together, Concordia alumni form a valuable network. Next time you are hiring, consider the Choose Concordians program.</p>
<h2>Join the program or learn more</h2>
<p><a href="http://www.surveymonkey.com/s/QG3LLRK" adhocenable="false">Register today</a> and youâll hear from us shortly. Information: <a><a adhocenable="false" href="mailto:alumni@concordia">alumni@concordia</a></a> or 514-848-2424, ext. 7377</p>
<p><i>A partnership between Advancement and Alumni Relations, Career and Placement Services, the John Molson School of Business's Career Management Services and the Institute for Co-operative Education.</i></p>

</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt1-c1 span3"><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b>Success stories</b><br>
â¢ Real estate magnate helps fellow alumni build careers, March 8, 2013<br>
â¢ Concordians taking care of business, October 22, 2012</p>

</div></div>
</div></div><div style="clear:both"></div>

</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Launched in February 2009, Dinner for Eight creates a forum in which Concordia alumni share their professional experiences and outlook with students over a meal in a casual and relaxed setting, either a restaurant or the host's home.</p>
<p>Dinner for Eight complements the <a href="/alumni-friends/programs/mentor.html" adhocenable="false">Concordia Mentor Program</a>, whose primary goal is to match students with experienced alumni for career guidance and advice.</p>
<h2>Objectives</h2>
<ul>
<li>Foster interaction between alumni and students</li>
<li>Improve student life by creating valuable opportunities in which students can obtain career guidance and advice, as well as job-market information, from experienced professionals and one another</li>
<li>Promote the Mentor Program to alumni and students</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Students: reserve your seat</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="reserve"></a>The Dinner for Eight program is free and open to <b>current students (valid Concordia ID required) on a first-come, first-served basis</b>.</p>
<ol>
<li><a href="/content/dam/concordia/aar/docs/student-programs/Dinner%20for%20Eight-Fall%202013-HOSTS-v1.pdf">Browse the list of hosts</a> for a dinner that matches your career interests.<br>
</li>
<li>Choose&nbsp;<b>ONE DINNER ONLY.</b></li>
<li>Click on the host name to launch the registration page. Priority will be given to students whose education background is most closely aligned to the host's job responsibilities or industry.</li>
<li>An email confirming your registration will be sent to you.</li>
<li>All registered students <b>must attend a briefing session prior to the dinner.</b> An invitation to the briefing session will be sent to you shortly after the confirmation email.</li>
</ol>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/alumni-friends/programs/student-programs/dinner-for-eight/jcr:content/content-main/image"><img title="dinner1" alt="dinner1" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/alumni-friends/programs/student-programs/dinner-for-eight/_jcr_content/content-main/image.img.jpg/1375095372914.jpg"></div>
</div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h2><a name="hosts"></a>Alumni: Host a dinner</h2>
<p><b>The Fall 2013 dinner schedule is now full.</b> We invite you to <a adhocenable="false" href="http://www.surveymonkey.com/s/DinnerFor8HOSTS" target="_blank">register to be scheduled for a Spring 2014 dinner</a>.</p>
<ul>
<li>As a dinner host, you choose the date to spend an evening with pre-selected students.</li>
<li>Your dinner can be a simple or gourmet meal in your home or a three-course meal at Ristorante Otto in downtown Montreal's W Hotel. Dinners hosted in a restaurant <b>MUST</b> be held at the Otto restaurant.</li>
<li>You pick the number of students you wish to host. We suggest four to six students per host and a maximum of eight students per couple.</li>
<li>You will be matched with students based on career interest and/or area of study.</li>
<li>Hosts will be scheduled on a first-come, first-served basis, but priority will be given to alumni who wish to host a dinner in their homes.</li>
<li>Hosts are requested to provide a brief bio to be shared with the students attending the dinner.</li>
<li>Hosts are encouraged to come up with ice-breakers to be emailed to the students prior to the meal. Tips on how to make the event more enjoyable will also be provided.</li>
<li>Your meal as well as the students' meals will be covered. Meals of spouses or guests of hosts are excluded, as well as alcoholic drinks during dinners.</li>
<li>If you prefer to host the dinner at home, we'll reimburse you up to $20 for each student hosted.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase section reference"><div style="display:inline;" class="cq-dd-paragraph"><div class="parbase wysiwyg">

514-848-2424, ext. 7377<br>
</p>

</div></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="page-header parbase section"> 






<div class="c-intro row">
    <h1 class="span8 section-header">Concordia Mentor Program</h1>

    
    <div class="span8">
        <p>Alumni share career experience and knowledge with recent graduates and students.</p>

    </div>
	<div class="span4">
                        <a class="btn btn-block btn-large bg-light-grey" href="/alumni-friends/programs/mentor/search-for-a-mentor.html">
                    
                    Search for a mentor
                    </a>
                        <a class="btn btn-block btn-large bg-light-grey" href="/alumni-friends/programs/mentor/search-for-a-mentor/become-a-mentor.html">
                    
                    Become a mentor
                    </a></div>
</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">How does it work?</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The Concordia Mentor Program database may be searched and viewed by anyone. A mentor match is available exclusively to currently enrolled Concordia University students and alumni of Concordia University, Loyola College and Sir George Williams University.</p>
<p>The&nbsp;<a href="/alumni-friends/programs/student-programs/dinner-for-eight.html" adhocenable="false">Dinner for Eight</a>&nbsp;program and the <a href="/alumni-friends/programs/student-programs/speed-networking.html" adhocenable="false">Speed-Networking</a>&nbsp;event complement the mentor program and present further opportunities for mentors and mentees to network.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt0"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c0 span6"><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Mentors</h3>
<p>Alumni provide information about their current job, workplace and general career information, which is posted online in a&nbsp;searchable database. Mentors remain anonymous unless they wish to share their information with the mentee.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase button section">








<a style="margin-bottom:10px;" class="btn btn-large " href="/alumni-friends/programs/mentor/search-for-a-mentor/become-a-mentor.html" target="_self">Become a mentor</a>

</div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c1 span6"><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Mentees</h3>
<p>Students and recent grads search the database to find a suitable mentor. Should they wish to contact a mentor, they must register. Once approved, they can contact a mentor via a form on the website, which protects the mentor's privacy.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase button section">








<a style="margin-bottom:10px;" class="btn btn-large " href="/alumni-friends/programs/mentor/search-for-a-mentor/become-a-mentee.html" target="_self">Become a mentee</a>

</div>
</div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt5"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt5-c0 span3"><div class="parbase vignette section">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<p>Rami Adwan returned to Jordan after graduating to work in the software development and information technology field. In 2008, his career took a turn when he became the deputy CEO for marketing and sales at Taameer Jordan Holdings, a publicly traded real-estate developer in Jordan.</p>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="page-header parbase section"> 






<div class="c-intro row">
    <h1 class="span8 section-header">Concordia Mentor Program</h1>

    
    <div class="span8">
        <p>Alumni share career experience and knowledge with recent graduates and students.</p>

    </div>
	<div class="span4">
                        <a class="btn btn-block btn-large bg-light-grey" href="/alumni-friends/programs/mentor/search-for-a-mentor.html">
                    
                    Search for a mentor
                    </a>
                        <a class="btn btn-block btn-large bg-light-grey" href="/alumni-friends/programs/mentor/search-for-a-mentor/become-a-mentor.html">
                    
                    Become a mentor
                    </a></div>
</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">How does it work?</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The Concordia Mentor Program database may be searched and viewed by anyone. A mentor match is available exclusively to currently enrolled Concordia University students and alumni of Concordia University, Loyola College and Sir George Williams University.</p>
<p>The&nbsp;<a href="/alumni-friends/programs/student-programs/dinner-for-eight.html" adhocenable="false">Dinner for Eight</a>&nbsp;program and the <a href="/alumni-friends/programs/student-programs/speed-networking.html" adhocenable="false">Speed-Networking</a>&nbsp;event complement the mentor program and present further opportunities for mentors and mentees to network.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt0"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c0 span6"><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Mentors</h3>
<p>Alumni provide information about their current job, workplace and general career information, which is posted online in a&nbsp;searchable database. Mentors remain anonymous unless they wish to share their information with the mentee.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase button section">








<a style="margin-bottom:10px;" class="btn btn-large " href="/alumni-friends/programs/mentor/search-for-a-mentor/become-a-mentor.html" target="_self">Become a mentor</a>

</div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c1 span6"><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Mentees</h3>
<p>Students and recent grads search the database to find a suitable mentor. Should they wish to contact a mentor, they must register. Once approved, they can contact a mentor via a form on the website, which protects the mentor's privacy.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase button section">








<a style="margin-bottom:10px;" class="btn btn-large " href="/alumni-friends/programs/mentor/search-for-a-mentor/become-a-mentee.html" target="_self">Become a mentee</a>

</div>
</div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt5"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt5-c0 span3"><div class="parbase vignette section">

















<div class="c-vignette" data-href="/content/concordia//en/alumni-friends/programs/mentor/information-for-mentors.html" >

	    <div class="title">Information for mentors
	    
	    </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="c-intro row">
    <h1 class="span8 section-header">Areas to support</h1>

    
    <div class="span8">
        <p>Provide the university with the flexibility to respond to opportunities and financial challenges that arise throughout the academic year.</p>

    </div>
	<div class="span4">
                        <a class="btn btn-block btn-large bg-light-grey" target='_blank' href="https://advweb.concordia.ca/cf/og/OnlineGiving.cfm">

                    </a></div>
</div></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<h1>Our campaigns</h1>
