<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Annual Giving</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Thousands of donors â including alumni, parents, faculty members, staff and friends â support Concordia University every year through Annual Giving. As a reliable source of sustained revenue, these donations provide vital funding for Concordia's diverse needs as they arise.</p>
<p>You'll have an opportunity to show your support and commitment to Concordia when a student calls or when you receive an appeal in the mail.</p>
<p>Concordia's internal community provides annual support through the <a adhocenable="false" href="/alumni-friends/giving-to-concordia/our-campaigns/community-campaign.html">Community Campaign</a> and the <a href="/alumni-friends/giving-to-concordia/concordia-shuffle.html" adhocenable="false">Concordia Shuffle</a>. The <a href="/alumni-friends/giving-to-concordia/our-campaigns/grad-class-campaign.html" adhocenable="false">Grad Class Campaign</a> encourages graduating students to give back to the university by helping those who follow in their footsteps.</p>

</div></div>

<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Major giving</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>You may be fortunate enough to be in a position to make a significant donation to Concordia. Major gifts allow you to have a lasting impact on a project or cause close to your heart.</p>
<p>If you are interested in supporting another area of the University, we welcome the opportunity to help make your philanthropic priorities a reality.</p>
<p>For more information about making a transformational contribution to a specific faculty or department at Concordia, please visit:</p>

</div></div>
<div class="link-list section">





    <div class="c-bloc-links class="">

        <ul class="">

</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c1 span6"><div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<a href="/alumni-friends/giving-to-concordia/options/planned-giving.html"><h2 class="section-header ">Planned giving</h2></a>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Making a gift through a will or life-insurance policy, is only part of the story. Planned giving is for the living.</p>
<p>Think about your charitable giving as part of your financial or estate plan. Planned giving offers you a chance to perpetuate your values and commitment to higher education.</p>

</div></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
	$ = jQuery;
	$(document).ready(function() {
	    $('#tabs a:first').tab('show');
	    var hash = window.location.hash;
	    if (hash == undefined || hash == ""){
	      var previouslyActive = getCookie("concordia-component-tab-active-tab");
          if (previouslyActive != undefined) hash = previouslyActive;
	    }
	    hash && $('ul.nav a[href="' + hash + '"]').tab('show');

	    $('.nav-tabs a').click(function (e) {
	        $(this).tab('show');
	        var scrollmem = $('body').scrollTop();
	        window.location.hash = this.hash;
	        $('html,body').scrollTop(scrollmem);
	        setCookie("concordia-component-tab-active-tab", this.hash, 1);
	    });
	});
        /** COOKIE GETTER AND SETTER FUNCTIONS **/
    function setCookie(c_name,value,exdays){
        var exdate=new Date();
        exdate.setDate(exdate.getDate() + exdays);
        var c_value=escape(value) + ((exdays==null) ? "" : "; expires="+exdate.toUTCString());
        document.cookie=c_name + "=" + c_value;
    }
    function getCookie(c_name){
      var c_value=document.cookie;
      var c_start=c_value.indexOf(" " + c_name + "=");
      if (c_start == -1)	{
        c_start=c_value.indexOf(c_name + "=");
      }
      if (c_start == -1){
        c_value=null;
      } else {
        c_start=c_value.indexOf("=", c_start) + 1;
        var c_end=c_value.indexOf(";", c_start);
        if (c_end == -1){
          c_end=c_value.length;
        }
        c_value=unescape(c_value.substring(c_start,c_end));
      }
      return c_value;
    }
	</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<p>Employees of Concordia university please <a adhocenable="false" href="https://cspace.concordia.ca/services/hr/benefits.html">click here to access Cspace, the intranet</a>.&nbsp; All the information for employees is now located on Cspace, the intranet for faculty and staff.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>In which plans can you and your eligible dependents participate?</h3>
<p>That depends on your eligible employee group.</p>
<p>Select your eligible employee group below and begin a quick tour of your benefits.</p>
<p>Please note that information from Collective Agreements or Agreements supersedes information in this guide.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">

</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If you are a part-time, permanent employee (working 20 hours or more per week)</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   smallText table-condensed horizontalLines verticalLines table-striped">
    <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" width="100%" border="1">
<tbody><tr><th>You must participate in</th>
</tr><tr><td valign="top"><ul>
<li><a href="/hr/benefits/health.html" adhocenable="false">Health Plan</a>, which includes vision care coverage (possibility to opt out of plan if covered under another group health plan)</li>
<li><a href="/hr/benefits/dental.html">Dental Plan</a> (possibility to opt out of plan if covered under another group dental plan)</li>
<li>Paid Sick Leave Plan (intranet)</li>
<li><a href="/hr/benefits/pension.html" adhocenable="false">Pension Plan</a><br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">

    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">

</li>

<li><a href="/hr/benefits/dental.html" adhocenable="false">Dental Plan</a> (possibility to opt out of plan if covered under another group dental plan)</li>
<li>Paid Sick Leave Plan (intranet)</li>
<li><a href="/hr/benefits/pension.html" adhocenable="false">Pension Plan</a> (provided that, in the calendar year before joining the plan, you worked at least 700 hours at Concordia or earned remuneration from the University equal to at least 35% of the <a href="/hr/glossary.html#YMPE" adhocenable="false">YMPE</a>)</li>
</ul>
</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

<div class="rte">
<hr>

<h3>Pension plan</h3>
<p>The <a href="/hr/benefits/pension.html" adhocenable="false">Concordia Pension Plan</a> is a worry-free way to save for retirement. It provides benefits that are defined ahead of time based on a set formula using your <a adhocenable="false" href="/hr/glossary.html#pensionable-earnings">pensionable earnings</a> and years of <a adhocenable="false" href="/hr/glossary.html#credited-service">credited service</a>.</p>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Jobs on campus</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Looking for a job on campus? Many areas of the university need students throughout the year on a full- and part-time basis. It's a great, flexible way to gain valuable work experience and complement your studies.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Here are some tips to land a campus job:</p>
<h3>1. Check out the Work-Study Program</h3>
<ul>
<li>The&nbsp;Financial Aid &amp; Awards Office&nbsp;offers a work-study program, available to full-time students only. <a adhocenable="false" href="/students/financial-support/work-study.html">See if you're eligible and apply here</a>.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<h3>2. Reach out to alumni</h3>
<ul>
<li>Alumni Advancement and Alumni Relations needs help from current students throughout the year for fundraising campaigns and events. To work at the&nbsp;<b>Annual Giving Call Centre</b>, apply between August 5 and 22. Send your CV and cover letter by email to <a adhocenable="false" href="mailto:call.centre.alumni@concordia.ca">call.centre.alumni@concordia.ca</a>. To work at&nbsp;Alumni events, you can apply throghout the year by sending your CV and cover letter by email to <a adhocenable="false" href="mailto:events@concordia.ca">events@concordia.ca</a>.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<h3>3. Join the athletics team</h3>
<ul>
<li>Athletics &amp; Recreation hires referees, timekeepers, ticket sellers, parking attendants and more.</li>
<li>Fill out an application form during the summer. Send your CV to <a adhocenable="false" href="mailto:ljacinto@alcor.concordia.ca">ljacinto@alcor.concordia.ca<br>
&nbsp;</a></li>
</ul>
<h3>4. Help out at Campus Stores</h3>
<ul>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="http://retail.concordia.ca">Campus Retail Stores</a> hires students during rush periods on a casual part-time basis at both the Sir George Williams Bookstore and Loyola Bookstore. <a adhocenable="false" href="http://retail.concordia.ca/contact/jobs.html">Learn more here</a>.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<h3>5. Join the Computer Store</h3>
<ul>
<li>Part-time positions are occasionally available. Inquire to&nbsp;<a adhocenable="false" href="mailto:stevenz@alcor.concordia.ca">stevenz@alcor.concordia.ca<br>
&nbsp;</a></li>
</ul>
<h3>6. Check out the Concordia Student Union (CSU)</h3>
<ul>
<li>The CSU offers a range of jobs from administrative to research positions. <a adhocenable="false" href="http://www.csu.qc.ca/index.php?module=pagesetter&amp;tid=4">Find current openings</a>.&nbsp;</li>
<li>They also administer&nbsp;<a adhocenable="false" href="http://hojo.csu.qc.ca/">HoJo, a housing and job bank</a>.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<h3>7. Solve tech problems at IITS</h3>
<ul>
<li>Working at Instructional and Information Technology Services (IITS) gives you real-world work experience on a variety of IT projects.</li>
<li>Casual positions (non-contract), if available, are posted on <a adhocenable="false" href="http://hojo.csu.qc.ca/">HoJo</a> or <a adhocenable="false" href="http://cdev.concordia.ca/our-services/job-search-and-resume/">CAPS</a>.</li>
<li>Full-time positions (permanent), if available, are posted on the Human Resources website.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<h3>8. Invigilate an exam</h3>
<ul>
<li>The Exams office offers invigilation positions to graduate students, or other interested parties <b>who are not current undergraduate students</b>.</li>
<li>Bring or mail your CV to the <a adhocenable="false" href="/offices/5748475904021/location.html">Office of the Registrar, LB-720</a>.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<h3>9. Greet newcomers at the Welcome Centre</h3>
<ul>
<li>Show Concordia in its best light: become a Campus Tour Guide! Positions are posted on <a adhocenable="false" href="http://hojo.csu.qc.ca/">HoJo</a>.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<h3>10. Apply to a company on-campus</h3>
<ul>
<li>Chartwells, you'll find general help, including evenings and weekends.</li>
<li><b>Fax your CV</b> to 514-848-3644</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase target section">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Dental plan</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>No matter where youâre going in life, thereâs nothing like a bright smile to make a good impression.</p>
<p>The Concordia Dental Plan helps you obtainâand maintainâgood, strong teeth by paying a portion of your dental careâ¦ and your familyâs, too.</p>
<p>While the plan covers many services and procedures, there are some exclusions and limitations.</p>
<h5>Health &amp; Dental Plan coverage for temporary residents - 21-day travel restriction</h5>
<p>If you are a temporary resident holding a work permit please take note of the following travel restriction regulation:</p>
<ul>
<li>If you leave the province of QuÃ©bec temporarily for a period of more than 21 consecutive days you will no longer be covered under the RÃ©gie de lâassurance maladie du QuÃ©bec (RAMQ) for the duration of your absence, retroactive to the day of your departure. You are obliged to advise the RAMQ of any absence of more than 21 consecutive days.</li>
<li>As you are no longer covered under the RAMQ your coverage under the Concordia Health and Dental plans cease for the duration of your absence, retroactive to the day of your departure</li>
<li>This regulation applies whether you are travelling on vacation or on university business</li>
</ul>
<p>We therefore strongly recommend that you secure personal private insurance for yourself and your dependents, if applicable, when leaving the province of QuÃ©bec for more than 21 consecutive days. To ensure you secure appropriate personal travel insurance, it is necessary to mention the citizenship of the passport under which you are travelling as well as all the countries you will be visiting during your travels</p>
<p>Be sure to speak with <a href="http://www.desjardinslifeinsurance.com/en/Pages/home.aspx" target="_blank">Desjardins Financial Security</a> if you expect major dental expenses or if you are unsure whether or not the plan covers a specific expense.</p>
<h3>Highlights</h3>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   smallText table-condensed horizontalLines verticalLines table-striped">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><th valign="top" colspan="2">Current coverage<br>
</th>
</tr><tr><td valign="top"><b>Annual deductible</b></td>
<td valign="top">$50 per person<br>
$100 per family</td>
</tr><tr><td valign="top"><b>Preventive services, restorative services, endodontics, periodontics and major surgery reimbursed at:</b></td>
<td valign="top">100%, checkups once every 6 months</td>
</tr><tr><td valign="top"><b>Major restorative services reimbursed at:</b></td>
<td valign="top">50%</td>
</tr><tr><td valign="top"><b>Orthodontic services reimbursed at:</b></td>
<td valign="top">50%</td>
</tr><tr><td valign="top"><b>Maximum reimbursement</b></td>
<td><ul>
<li>$1,750 per covered individual, for all services (except orthodontics) rendered in a benefit year</li>
<li>$2,500 per covered individual, for all orthodontic services rendered in a lifetime</li>
</ul>
</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Please refer to the Eligible expenses section of the intranet (Cspace) for a list of various covered expenses under each type of service as well as the Exclusions and limitations section.</p>

</div></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Glossary of terms</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<div style="text-align: center;" class="pagination"><a href="#a">A</a>&nbsp;l&nbsp; <a href="#b">B</a>&nbsp;l&nbsp; <a href="#c">C</a>&nbsp;l&nbsp; <a href="#d">D</a>&nbsp;l&nbsp; <a href="#e">E</a>&nbsp;l&nbsp; <a href="#f">F</a>&nbsp;l&nbsp; <a href="#g">G</a>&nbsp;l&nbsp; <a href="#h">H</a>&nbsp;l&nbsp; <a href="#i">I</a>&nbsp;l&nbsp; <a href="#j">J</a>&nbsp;l&nbsp; <a href="#k">K</a>&nbsp;l&nbsp; <a href="#l">L</a>&nbsp;l&nbsp; <a href="#m">M</a>&nbsp;l&nbsp; <a href="#n">N</a>&nbsp;l&nbsp; <a href="#o">O</a>&nbsp;l&nbsp; <a href="#p">P</a>&nbsp;l&nbsp; <a href="#q">Q</a>&nbsp;l&nbsp; <a href="#r">R</a>&nbsp;l&nbsp; <a href="#s">S</a>&nbsp;l&nbsp; <a href="#t">T</a>&nbsp;l&nbsp; <a href="#u">U</a>&nbsp;l&nbsp; <a href="#v">V</a>&nbsp;l&nbsp; <a href="#w">W</a>&nbsp;l&nbsp; <a href="#x">X</a>&nbsp;l&nbsp; <a href="#y">Y</a>&nbsp;l&nbsp; <a href="#z">Z</a></div>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="a"></a></p>
<h2>A</h2>
<dl>
<a name="acumae"></a> <dt>ACUMAE</dt> <dd>Association of Concordia University Managerial and Administrative Employees.</dd></dl>
<dl>
<a name="acute-care"></a> <dt>Acute care</dt> <dd>This refers to the care of a patient for a brief but severe episode of illness, for conditions that result from disease or trauma, or during recovery following surgery. Acute care is generally provided in a hospital.</dd></dl>
<dl>
<a name="accident"></a> <dt>Accident</dt> <dd>Under the emergency care and travel assistance outside your province of residence, this refers to any event due to sudden and unforeseeable external causes that inflicts bodily injuries which are certified by a physician, directly and independently of any other cause. It does not mean any form of disease, or degenerative process, en inguinal, femoral, umbilical or incisional hernia, or any infection other than an infection of a visible, external cut or wound accidentally sustained.</dd></dl>
<dl>
<a name="annual-base-salary"></a> <dt>Annual base salary</dt> <dd>This refers to your annual earnings as an employee, excluding overtime, stipends or any supplementary earnings.</dd></dl>
<dl>
<a name="average-gross-weekly-earnings"></a> <dt>Average gross weekly earnings</dt> <dd>This amount is used to determine benefits under the Short-Term Disability Plan. It is equal to 108% of the dollar value of your contract (to account for vacation pay) divided by the scheduled number of weeks in the contract.</dd> </dl>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="b"></a></p>
<h2>B</h2>
<dl>
<a name="beneficiary"></a> <dt>Beneficiary</dt> <dd>This is the person whom you designate to receive benefits under the Basic Life Insurance, Optional Life Insurance and Optional Accident Insurance Plans, in the event of your death. If you do not designate a beneficiary, the benefits will be paid to your estate.</dd></dl>
<dl>
<a name="benefit-year"></a> <dt>Benefit Year</dt> <dd>Under the Health Plan, this refers to:<br>
<ul>
<li>if you are a part-time faculty employee: either January to December or September to August, depending on your teaching contract;</li>
<li>if you are not a part-time faculty employee: January to December.</li>
</ul>
</dd> </dl>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="c"></a></p>
<h2>C</h2>
<dl>
<a name="coma-or-comatose"></a> <dt>Coma or comatose</dt> <dd>Falling into a coma or becoming comatose means being in a profound stupor or in a state of complete unconsciousness.</dd></dl>
<dl>
<a name="commuted value"></a> <dt>Commuted value</dt> <dd>The lump-sum calculated to pay you the amount you would need today to buy the pension promised by the plan at your retirement, assuming that this amount is invested and earns a reasonable rate of return from now until retirement. This calculation is very complex - it involves a number of assumptions and can only be performed by an actuary.</dd></dl>
<dl>
<a name="cpi"></a> <dt>Consumer Price Index (CPI)</dt> <dd>An annual measure of the change in the cost of living, based on the price increases of a fixed âbasketâ? of goods and services bought by Canadian consumers. The measurement of the CPI is monitored by Statistics Canada.</dd></dl>
<dl>
<a name="continuous-service"></a> <dt>Continuous service</dt> <dd>Uninterrupted employment since your date of hire, including certain qualified periods of leave.</dd></dl>
<dl>
<a name="contributory-member"></a> <dt>Contributory member</dt> <dd>When you join the Pension Plan for the Employees of Concordia University, you automatically become a non-contributory member and earn benefits without having to contribute to the plan. However, you may choose to become a contributory member and, in turn, earn more benefits. You may change from contributory to non-contributory membership, and vice versa, each January 1. To do so, simply inform <a href="mailto:pensions@concordia.ca">Benefits Services</a> by the end of November in the preceding year.</dd></dl>
<dl>
<a name="convalescent-hospital"></a> <dt>Convalescent hospital</dt> <dd>A convalescent hospital is an institution that:<br>
<ul>
<li>provides recuperative care;</li>
<li>is eligible to receive payments under and in accordance with the provisions of the Provincial Hospital Act;</li>
<li>is operated according to the applicable laws of the jurisdiction in which it is located;</li>
<li>has a licensed physician and registered nurses in attendance 24 hours a day;</li>
<li>is regularly engaged in providing room and board and skilled nursing care for sick or injured persons during the convalescent stage of a sickness or injury; and</li>
<li>maintains a daily record of each patient under the care of a licensed physician.</li>
</ul>
</dd></dl>
<dl>
<a name="credited-service"></a> <dt>Credited service</dt> <dd>Your membership in the Pension Plan for the Employees of Concordia University from the date you joined the plan to the date of your retirement, termination of employment, death, or termination of participation as an active employee in the plan, including:<br>
<ul>
<li>service transferred from another plan;</li>
<li>periods of disability while eligible for or receiving benefits from an employer-sponsored long-term disability plan;</li>
<li>periods of disability while receiving Workersâ Compensation benefits, provided you are making contributions; and</li>
<li>periods of approved pregnancy/parental leave, provided the employee continues regular contributions.</li>
</ul>
If you are not a full-time employee, your credited service in a calendar year will be determined as the ratio of your actual earnings during the plan year to the earnings scheduled to be earned by full-time employees in the same employment category, provided that the ratio does not exceed 1.</dd></dl>
<dl>
<a name="CUCEPTFU"></a> <dt>CUCEPTFU</dt> <dd>Concordia University Continuing Education Part-Time Faculty Union.</dd></dl>
<dl>
<a name="cufa"></a> <dt>CUFA</dt> <dd>Concordia University Faculty Association.</dd></dl>
<dl>
<a name="culeu"></a> <dt>CULEU</dt> <dd>Concordia University Library Employees Union - Vanier or Webster.</dd></dl>
<dl>
<a name="cupeu"></a> <dt>CUPEU</dt> <dd>Concordia University Professional Employees Union.</dd></dl>
<dl>
<a name="cupfa"></a> <dt>CUPFA</dt> <dd>Concordia University Part-Time Faculty Association.</dd></dl>
<dl>
<a name="cussu"></a> <dt>CUSSU</dt> <dd>Concordia University Support Staff Union, including Loyola Maintenance as well as Trades, Maintenance and Distribution Sector.</dd></dl>
<dl>
<a name="cuuss-ts"></a> <dt>CUUSS-TS</dt> <dd>Concordia University Union of Support Staff - Technical Sector.</dd> </dl>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="d"></a></p>
<h2>D</h2>
<dl>
<a name="dependent-children"></a> <dt>Dependent children</dt> <dd>These are your natural, adopted, step or foster children, who are:<br>
<ul>
<li>unmarried;</li>
<li>living in Canada;</li>
<li>dependent on you for support; and</li>
<li>one of the following:</li>
<li>living in Canada;<ul>
<li>under age 21;</li>
<li>a full-time student, dependent on you for support; or</li>
<li>mentally or physically handicapped, and incapable of self-sustaining employment, as well as wholly dependent on you for support.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<pp>You must provide the insurance company with satisfactory proof of your childâs continued eligibility no later than 31 days after he or she turns 21. Proof may also be periodically required thereafter.</pp></ul>
</dd></dl>
<dl>
<a name="doctor"></a> <dt>Doctor</dt> <dd>A legally qualified medical practitioner lawfully entitled to practice medicine in the place where he provides the medical services.</dd></dl>
<dl>
<a name="duplicate-coverage"></a> <dt>Duplicate coverage</dt> <dd>Coverage provided to you and to your eligible dependents under a group insurance plan elsewhere, such as.</dd><ul>
<li>the one provided by your spouseâs employer; or</li>
<li>the plan under which you are covered as a retiree as a result of your prior job with another employer.</li>
</ul>
Proof of duplicate coverage consists of a letter (or any other document acceptable to Benefits Services) confirming that you â and, if applicable, your eligible dependents â are insured for coverage under another plan. </dl>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="e"></a></p>
<h2>E</h2>
<dl>
<a name="eligible-dependents"></a> <dt>Eligible dependents</dt> <dd>Your spouse and your dependent children.</dd></dl>
<dl>
<a name="emergency"></a> <dt>Emergency</dt> <dd>Under the emergency care and travel assistance outside your province of residence, this refers to any acute and unexpected condition, illness or injury requiring medical treatment.</dd> </dl>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="f"></a></p>
<h2>F</h2>
<dl>
<a name="family-member"></a> <dt>Family member(s)</dt> <dd>Under the emergency care and travel assistance outside your province of residence, this refers to any member of your immediate family as well as a step-father, step-mother, father-in-law, mother-in-law, grandparents, grandchildren, half-brothers, half-sisters, brothers-in-law, sisters-in-law, sons-in-law, daughters-in-law, uncles, aunts, nephews and nieces.Immediate family member refers to your spouse, son, daughter, father, mother, brother or sister.</dd></dl>
<dl>
<a name="final-average-earnings"></a> <dt>Final Average Earnings</dt> <dd>The average pensionable earnings during the 36 consecutive months of earnings that produce the highest average.</dd></dl>
<dl>
<a name="final-average-ympe"></a> <dt>Final Average YMPE</dt> <dd>Your pension under the Concordia Pension Plan is calculated at a different benefit rate for earnings below and above the Final Average YMPE. Your Final Average YMPE is the average of the YMPE for the last 36 calendar months preceding the determination of plan benefits. If you have less than 36 months of membership, the average will be taken over your entire membership.</dd> </dl>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="g"></a></p>
<h2>G</h2>
<h2>&nbsp;</h2>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="h"></a></p>
<h2>H</h2>
<dl>
<a name="healthy-natural-teeth"></a> <dt>Healthy natural teeth</dt> <dd>Under the Concordia Health Plan, this refers to natural teeth that are not afflicted with any pathology, including a tooth that has been treated or restored to normal function.</dd></dl>
<dl>
<a name="hospital"></a> <dt>Hospital</dt> <dd><pp>Health Plan (excluding Emergency care and travel assistance outside your province of residence):</pp> <pp>For coverage in Canada, a hospital is a facility that:</pp><ul>
<li>is legally licensed;</li>
<li>provides a broad range of medical and surgical services for sick and injured persons by, or under the supervision of, a staff of licensed physicians 24 hours a day; and</li>
<li>provides nursing care by, or under the direction of, a nurse 24 hours a day.</li>
</ul>
<pp>For coverage outside Canada, this term refers to any hospital that is designated as such by law and is intended for the care and treatment of sick and injured individuals, and which has organized facilities for diagnosis and major surgeries as well as 24-hour nursing service. The term does not include a nursing home, home for the aged or chronically ill, rest home, convalescent hospital, or a place for the care and treatment of alcoholism or drug abuse.</pp> <pp>Emergency care and travel assistance outside your province of residence:</pp> <pp>Any hospital that is designated as such by law and is intended for the care and treatment of sick and injured individuals, and which has organized facilities for diagnosis and major surgeries as well as 24-hour nursing service. The term does not include a nursing home, home for the aged or chronically ill, rest home, convalescent hospital, or a place for the care and treatment of alcoholism or drug abuse.</pp></dd> </dl>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="i"></a></p>
<h2>I</h2>
<dl>
<a name="illness"></a> <dt>Illness</dt> <dd>Under the emergency care and travel assistance outside your province of residence, this refers to any health deterioration or bodily disorder certified by a physician. For the purposes of travel assistance, organ donations and related complications are also considered illnesses.</dd></dl>
<dl>
<a name="immediate family member"></a> <dt>Immediate family member</dt> <dd>Under the emergency care and travel assistance outside your province of residence, this refers to your spouse, son, daughter, father, mother, brother or sister.</dd></dl>
<dl>
<a name="irrevocable"></a> <dt>Irrevocable</dt> <dd>This means that, subject to law, you cannot change your beneficiary without his or her written consent.</dd> </dl>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="j"></a></p>
<h2>J</h2>
<h2>&nbsp;</h2>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="k"></a></p>
<h2>K</h2>
<h2>&nbsp;</h2>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="l"></a></p>
<h2>L</h2>
<dl>
<a name="loss"></a> <dt>Loss</dt> <dd>Under the Optional Accident Insurance Plan, a loss resulting from an accident depends on the part of the body affected, as follows:<br>
 <br>
<table class="tablesorters table_4 cells_align_left cells_align_middle smallfont">
<tbody><tr><td class="th-blue">Arm or leg:</td>
<td>the complete severance through or above the elbow or knee joint</td>
</tr><tr><td class="th-blue">Eye:</td>
<td>the irrecoverable loss of the entire sight</td>
</tr><tr><td class="th-blue">Fingers:</td>
<td>the complete severance of two entire phalanges of the finger</td>
</tr><tr><td class="th-blue">Hand or foot:</td>
<td>the complete severance through or above the wrist or ankle joint, but below the elbow or knee joint</td>
</tr><tr><td class="th-blue">Hearing:</td>
<td>the complete and irrecoverable loss of hearing</td>
</tr><tr><td class="th-blue">Speech:</td>
<td>the complete and irrecoverable loss of the ability to utter intelligible sounds</td>
</tr><tr><td class="th-blue">Thumb:</td>
<td>the complete severance of one phalanx of the thumb</td>
</tr><tr><td class="th-blue">Toes:</td>
<td>the complete loss of one entire phalanx of the big toe and all phalanges of the other toes</td>
</tr></tbody></table>
</dd></dl>
<dl>
<a name="loss-of-use"></a> <dt>Loss of use</dt> <dd>Under the Optional Accident Insurance Plan, this refers to the total and irrecoverable loss of use, provided the loss is continuous for 12 consecutive months and, at the end of that time, is considered permanent.</dd> </dl>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="m"></a></p>
<h2>M</h2>
<h2>&nbsp;</h2>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="n"></a></p>
<h2>N</h2>
<dl>
<a name="normal-retirement-date"></a> <dt>Normal Retirement Date</dt> <dd>Your normal retirement date is the first day of the month coinciding with or following your 65th birthday.</dd> </dl>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="o"></a></p>
<h2>O</h2>
<h2>&nbsp;</h2>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="p"></a></p>
<h2>P</h2>
<dl>
<a name="pensionable-earnings"></a> <dt>Pensionable earnings</dt> <dd><pp>Your basic annual salary, excluding all stipends, overtime and supplementary earnings. During periods of leave for which reduced earnings may apply, your full base salary as determined by the University will be used for calculations. Deemed earnings in such periods of reduced pay shall not exceed the amount of compensation that is prescribed for this purpose by the Income Tax Act and Regulations.</pp> <pp>If you are disabled as certified by a physician and you are receiving disability payments under the Concordia Long-Term Disability Plan, your earnings during your disability will be equal to your earnings when your disability began, increased on each January 1 during your disability by the rate of increase in the Yearâs Maximum Pensionable Earnings.</pp> <pp>If you are not a full-time employee, your earnings will be annualized to determine your Final Average Earnings.</pp></dd></dl>
<dl>
<a name="pension-adjustment"></a> <dt>Pension adjustment</dt> <dd><p>In accordance with the Income Tax Act and Regulations, since 1990, the amount that you can contribute for a given year to your personal RRSP and the Concordia Group RSP combined is reduced by the deemed value of the benefit you earned under the Concordia Pension Plan in the previous year. This reduction is called a Pension Adjustment and is reported on your T-4 slip each year.</p>
<p>The Pension Adjustment is calculated as follows:</p>
</dd></dl>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase box section">









<div class="c-sidebar-calltoaction bloc link-color-dark with-border" style=" color: # !important;   padding: 10px 10px 10px 20px;">


    <h2 class="section-header" style='color: # !important; '></h2>
    <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p style="text-align: center;">9 x the pension benefit you earned for the year</p>
<p style="text-align: center;">LESS $600</p>
<p style="text-align: center;">This calculation is subject to a maximum of $14,900.</p>

</div></div>


</div>



</div>

</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The Pension Adjustment will need to be increased by:</p>
<ul>
<li>any additional voluntary contributions that you made to the plan in the previous year; and</li>
<li>any applicable Past Service Pension Adjustment.</li>
</ul>
<dl>
<a name="permanent-total-disability"></a> <dt>Permanent total disability</dt> <dd>Under the Optional Accident Insurance Plan, you are permanently and totally disabled when, as a result of an injury, you cannot engage in any occupation or employment for compensation or profit for which you are reasonably qualified by reason of occupation, training or experience.</dd></dl>
<dl>
<a name="physician"></a> <dt>Physician</dt> <dd>A legally qualified medical practitioner lawfully entitled to practice medicine in the place where he provides medical services.</dd> </dl>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="q"></a></p>
<h2>Q</h2>
<h2>&nbsp;</h2>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="r"></a></p>
<h2>R</h2>
<dl>
<a name="regular-monthly-earnings"></a> <dt>Regular monthly earnings</dt> <dd>This refers to 1/12th of your annual earnings as an employee, excluding overtime, stipends or any supplementary earnings.</dd></dl>
<dl>
<a name="relative"></a> <dt>Relative</dt> <dd>In the event of an emergency outside the province covered under the Concordia Health Plan, this means your spouse, parent, child, brother or sister</dd> </dl>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="s"></a></p>
<h2>S</h2>
<dl>
<a name="smoker-status"></a> <dt>Smoker status</dt> <dd><pp>A non-smoker is a person who has not used any form of tobacco (including but not limited to cigarettes, cigars, pipe tobacco, chewing tobacco, snuff or similar products) for the last 12 months immediately preceding the date written beside his or her signature on the declaration of smoker status form. You are considered a smoker if you do not meet these conditions.</pp></dd> <pp>You are responsible for notifying Benefits Services if your smoker status changes.</pp></dl>
<dl>
<a name="spouse"></a> <dt>Spouse</dt> <dd><b>Pension Plan</b><br>
 On the date a determination of marital status is required for the Pension Plan, your spouse is the person who:<ul>
<li>is married to you, the plan member; or</li>
<li>has been living in a conjugal relationship with you (provided you are not married) for a period of not less than 3 years, or for a period of not less than 1 year if:<ul>
<li>at least 1 child is born, or to be born, of your union;</li>
<li>you have jointly adopted at least 1 child while living together in a conjugal relationship; or</li>
<li>one of you has adopted at least 1 child who is the child of the other, while living together in a conjugal relationship.</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<b>Other plans</b><br>
 On the date a determination of marital status is required for other Concordia benefit plans, your spouse is the person:<br>
<ul>
<li>to whom you are legally married by virtue of a civil or religious ceremony; or</li>
<li>with whom you have continuously lived in a spousal relationship for at least one year</li>
</ul>
This time condition for the Concordia benefits plans (other than the Pension Plan) is waived if a child is born of your union.</dd> </dl>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="t"></a></p>
<h2>T</h2>
<dl>
<a name="total-paralysis"></a> <dt>Total paralysis</dt> <dd>The total and irrecoverable paralysis of limbs.</dd> </dl>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="u"></a></p>
<h2>U</h2>
<dl>
<a name="usual-and-prevailing"></a> <dt>Usual and prevailing</dt> <dd>Under the Concordia Health Plan, this refers to amounts that are normally charged for the eligible expenses in the region where the expenses are incurred.</dd> </dl>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="v"></a></p>
<h2>V</h2>
<h2>&nbsp;</h2>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="w"></a></p>
<h2>W</h2>
<h2>&nbsp;</h2>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="x"></a></p>
<h2>X</h2>
<h2>&nbsp;</h2>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="y"></a></p>
<h2>Y</h2>
<dl>
<a name="YMPE"></a> <dt>Yearâs Maximum Pensionable Earnings (YMPE)</dt> <dd>This refers to the maximum annual earnings on which employers and employees contribute to the Canada Pension Plan or QuÃ©bec Pension Plan. The government increases this amount every year, according to the increase in the Average Industrial Wage Index in Canada. For 2013, the YMPE is $51,100.</dd> </dl>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="z"></a></p>
<h2>Z</h2>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Jobs on campus</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Looking for a job on campus? Many areas of the university need students throughout the year on a full- and part-time basis. It's a great, flexible way to gain valuable work experience and complement your studies.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Here are some tips to land a campus job:</p>
<h3>1. Check out the Work-Study Program</h3>
<ul>
<li>The&nbsp;Financial Aid &amp; Awards Office&nbsp;offers a work-study program, available to full-time students only. <a adhocenable="false" href="/students/financial-support/work-study.html">See if you're eligible and apply here</a>.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<h3>2. Reach out to alumni</h3>
<ul>
<li>Alumni Advancement and Alumni Relations needs help from current students throughout the year for fundraising campaigns and events. To work at the&nbsp;<b>Annual Giving Call Centre</b>, apply between August 5 and 22. Send your CV and cover letter by email to <a adhocenable="false" href="mailto:call.centre.alumni@concordia.ca">call.centre.alumni@concordia.ca</a>. To work at&nbsp;Alumni events, you can apply throghout the year by sending your CV and cover letter by email to <a adhocenable="false" href="mailto:events@concordia.ca">events@concordia.ca</a>.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<h3>3. Join the athletics team</h3>
<ul>
<li>Athletics &amp; Recreation hires referees, timekeepers, ticket sellers, parking attendants and more.</li>
<li>Fill out an application form during the summer. Send your CV to <a adhocenable="false" href="mailto:ljacinto@alcor.concordia.ca">ljacinto@alcor.concordia.ca<br>
&nbsp;</a></li>
</ul>
<h3>4. Help out at Campus Stores</h3>
<ul>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="http://retail.concordia.ca">Campus Retail Stores</a> hires students during rush periods on a casual part-time basis at both the Sir George Williams Bookstore and Loyola Bookstore. <a adhocenable="false" href="http://retail.concordia.ca/contact/jobs.html">Learn more here</a>.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<h3>5. Join the Computer Store</h3>
<ul>
<li>Part-time positions are occasionally available. Inquire to&nbsp;<a adhocenable="false" href="mailto:stevenz@alcor.concordia.ca">stevenz@alcor.concordia.ca<br>
&nbsp;</a></li>
</ul>
<h3>6. Check out the Concordia Student Union (CSU)</h3>
<ul>
<li>The CSU offers a range of jobs from administrative to research positions. <a adhocenable="false" href="http://www.csu.qc.ca/index.php?module=pagesetter&amp;tid=4">Find current openings</a>.&nbsp;</li>
<li>They also administer&nbsp;<a adhocenable="false" href="http://hojo.csu.qc.ca/">HoJo, a housing and job bank</a>.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<h3>7. Solve tech problems at IITS</h3>
<ul>
<li>Working at Instructional and Information Technology Services (IITS) gives you real-world work experience on a variety of IT projects.</li>
<li>Casual positions (non-contract), if available, are posted on <a adhocenable="false" href="http://hojo.csu.qc.ca/">HoJo</a> or <a adhocenable="false" href="http://cdev.concordia.ca/our-services/job-search-and-resume/">CAPS</a>.</li>
<li>Full-time positions (permanent), if available, are posted on the Human Resources website.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<h3>8. Invigilate an exam</h3>
<ul>
<li>The Exams office offers invigilation positions to graduate students, or other interested parties <b>who are not current undergraduate students</b>.</li>
<li>Bring or mail your CV to the <a adhocenable="false" href="/offices/5748475904021/location.html">Office of the Registrar, LB-720</a>.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<h3>9. Greet newcomers at the Welcome Centre</h3>
<ul>
<li>Show Concordia in its best light: become a Campus Tour Guide! Positions are posted on <a adhocenable="false" href="http://hojo.csu.qc.ca/">HoJo</a>.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<h3>10. Apply to a company on-campus</h3>
<ul>
<li>Chartwells, you'll find general help, including evenings and weekends.</li>
<li><b>Fax your CV</b> to 514-848-3644</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>The fine print</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>We have made every effort to provide you with a clear summary of the key provisions of the various plans that make up the Concordia Benefits Program and other plans as well. But the world of benefits goes beyond what you see on this web site. Please note that this is only a summary of the Concordia Benefits Program based on official documents and policies. Concordia University, not the insurer, has prepared this summary solely to provide you with an overview of the program. It has no contractual value and does not include important conditions, limitations, restrictions, and exclusions. In any event, should any discrepancies, legal challenges, or questions arise, final interpretation will be governed by the terms of the official documents and policies.</p>
<p>The summary of the Concordia Benefits Program is based on official documents and policies. As a result, should any discrepancies or questions arise, final interpretation will be governed by the terms of the official documents and policies.</p>
<p>This benefits web site contains important information. Please share it with your family. Also, please contact the appropriate insurer or Benefits Services if you wish to know more about the terms and conditions of the plans, or if you need to know how they apply in a specific situation not described on this web site.</p>
<p>Also take note of the following important points:</p>
<ul>
<li>While Concordia University expects to maintain these benefits indefinitely, it reserves the right to amend or terminate them at anytime.</li>
<li>Should the government reduce or eliminate coverage within any program currently offered, the University reserves the right to not necessarily modify its program or cover any additional expenses.</li>
<li>Concordia will notify you of changes that affect your coverage.</li>
<li>The University reserves the right to change any of the cost-sharing provisions.</li>
<li>The results of all the calculators and tools found on this site do not constitute financial advice. The University recommends that you speak to a financial planner or advisor for all financial matters, such as retirement planning and life insurance needs. Concordia is not responsible for any financial decisions that you may make.</li>
<li>If you are seriously considering retiring soon, please contact Benefits Services for the most accurate estimate of your pension entitlement. Do not base your retirement decision simply on the Pension Projection Tool.</li>
<li>Links to external web sites are offered for information purposes only. They do not constitute in any way an endorsement on the University's behalf.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Health plan</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The Concordia Health Plan helps you and your insured eligible dependents pay for certain health-related expenses, in case of personal illness or injury.</p>
<p>While the plan covers many services and procedures, there are some exclusions and limitations.</p>
<p>Should you foresee any unusual expenses or expenses that do not appear in the list of eligible expenses, be sure to speak with <a target="_blank" href="http://www.desjardinslifeinsurance.com/en/Pages/home.aspx">Desjardins Financial Security Life Assurance Company</a> beforehand to find out if the plan will cover those expenses.</p>
<p>Remember, the best prescription for good health is prevention: eating well, exercising, and simply treating yourself right. But thereâs more! Take the <a adhocenable="false" href="/hr/benefits/health/road-to-health.html">Road to health: Tips for a sound body, mind...and wallet</a> for details.</p>
<p><a name="highlights"></a></p>
<h3>Highlights</h3>
<p>If you are a full-time employee or a part-time employee covered under the Comprehensive Health Plan, the following provisions apply. However, if you are a part-time employee covered under the RAMQ Drug Plan Equivalent, you are covered for the drugs listed on the RAMQ formulary; for more details, go to the <a target="_blank" href="http://www.ramq.gouv.qc.ca/index_en.shtml">government plan</a> site.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   smallText table-condensed horizontalLines verticalLines table-striped">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><th colspan="2">Current Coverage<br>
</th>
</tr><tr><td>Annual deductible</td>
<td>$60 per adult, maximum $120 per family</td>
</tr><tr><th colspan="2">Percentage reimbursed subject to the deductible and certain limits:</th>
</tr><tr><td valign="top">RAMQ drugs</td>
<td valign="top">80% (or 100% once these annual eligible expenses, including eligible medical and paramedical expenses, exceed $2,000 per family in a <a adhocenable="false" href="/hr/glossary.html#benefit-year">benefit year</a>)*</td>
</tr><tr><td valign="top">Medical and paramedical expenses (including paramedical practitioners)</td>
<td valign="top">80% (or 100% once these annual eligible expenses, including the portion of any drugs paid by a provincial drug plan, exceed $2,000 per family in a benefit year)*</td>
</tr><tr><td valign="top">Psychologists and psychiatrists</td>
<td valign="top">50%</td>
</tr><tr><td valign="top">Vision care (depending on your <a adhocenable="false" href="/hr/benefits.html">eligible employee group</a>)</td>
<td valign="top">80%</td>
</tr><tr><th colspan="2">Percentage reimbursed NOT subject to the deductible but subject to certain limits:</th>
</tr><tr><td valign="top">Non-RAMQ drugs</td>
<td valign="top">50%</td>
</tr><tr><td valign="top">Emergency care and travel assistance outside your province of residence</td>
<td valign="top">100%</td>
</tr><tr><td valign="top">Hospital care (semiprivate room in a public general <a adhocenable="false" href="/hr/glossary.html#hospital">hospital</a> or a licensed <a adhocenable="false" href="/hr/glossary.html#convalescent-hospital">convalescent hospital</a>)</td>
<td valign="top">100%</td>
</tr><tr><td valign="top">Maximum lifetime reimbursement</td>
<td valign="top"><ul>
<li>Emergency care and travel assistance:<br>
$1 million per insured person</li>
<li>All other eligible expenses combined:<br>
$1 million per insured person</li>
</ul>
</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><i>*Note: for each benefit year, the Plan provides that, once the combined expenses for RAMQ drugs and major medical services reaches $2,000 such expenses will be reimbursed at 100% for the rest of the benefit year.</i></p>
<p>This annual eligible expense maximum of $2,000 does not apply to:</p>
<ul>
<li>non-RAMQ drugs;</li>
<li>vision care; and</li>
<li>the services of psychologists and psychiatrists</li>
</ul>
<p>Please refer to the Eligible expenses section on the intranet (Cspace) for a list of various covered expenses under each type of service as well as the Exclusions and limitations section.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Required contributions</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>When you join the plan, you automatically become a non-contributory member. This means you earn benefits without having to make any contributions to the plan.</p>
<p>You can, however, choose to earn more benefits under the plan by becoming a <a href="/hr/glossary.html#contributory-member" adhocenable="false">contributory member</a>.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="non-contributory-vs-contributory"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Non-contributory vs. contributory">
					
                    Non-contributory vs. contributory
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The table below compares your contributions under the non-contributory and contributory options.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   smallText table-condensed horizontalLines verticalLines table-striped">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><th valign="top">If you are a ...</th>
<th valign="top">You contribute the following amount annually...</th>
</tr><tr><td valign="top"><b>Non-contributory member</b></td>
<td valign="top">Nothing</td>
</tr><tr><td valign="top"><b>Contributory member</b></td>
<td valign="top">4.5% of your <a href="/hr/glossary.html#pensionable-earnings" adhocenable="false">pensionable earnings</a> up to the <a href="/hr/glossary.html#YMPE">YMPE</a><br>
<b>PLUS</b><br>
6% of any pensionable earnings in excess of the YMPE<br>
Contributions are made by regular payroll deductions.<br>
Your contributions are tax deductible, subject to limits set by the Income Tax Act and Regulations.</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="changing-contribution-status"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Changing contribution status">
					
                    Changing contribution status
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>You may choose to go from being a contributory member to a non-contributory member, and vice versa, as of January 1 of each calendar year. To do so, you must submit your written request to the <a href="mailto:pensions@concordia.ca">pension specialists at Benefits Services</a> by the end of November of the preceding calendar year.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="withdrawing-contributions"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Withdrawing contributions">
					
                    Withdrawing contributions
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>You <i>may not withdraw</i> your contributions. Pension laws state you can only use your accumulated pension plan benefits for retirement income, unless your <a href="/hr/glossary.html#leave-university" adhocenable="false">employment ends</a> or you die before retirement.</p>
<p>Also, you cannot:</p>
<ul>
<li>assign your contributions;</li>
<li>borrow against your contributions or earned benefits (e.g., as loan collateral); or</li>
<li>use the contributions for anything that is not directly related to obtaining a pension.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Road to health</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Tips for a sound body, mindâ¦ and wallet</h3>
<p>As everyone knows, health is wealth. Being fit both physically and mentally will go a long way toward your overall well-being.</p>
<p>Thereâs another incentive to strive for optimal health: your wallet. Indeed, thereâs a price to pay for illness or injury:</p>
<ul>
<li>your out-of-pocket expenses for health care;</li>
<li>your payroll deductions for coverage under the <a adhocenable="false" href="/hr/benefits/health.html">Health Plan</a> and the <a adhocenable="false" href="/hr/benefits/dental.html">Dental Plan</a>; and</li>
<li>the income taxes that QuÃ©bec residents must pay on the premiums that the university pays for coverage.</li>
</ul>
<p>Some might point out that the last two items in the above list are payable whether you are healthy or not. Thatâs true, except that the amounts payable will grow as your medical and dental claims grow. As explained in the section How costs are determined under the Health Plan (see the intranet - Cspace), the premiums that both you and the University pay are based on the claims paid out to employees and pensioners each benefit year. So, how much participants and their families actually use the plan in any given benefit year will determine increases or decreases in benefit premiums at each renewal of the plan.</p>
<p>So, how do you achieve optimal health physicallyâ¦ and financially? Itâs a journey that takes place one day at a time. Are you ready? If so, take a hikeâ¦ the <a href="#healthyhike">Healthy Hike</a>, that is! The trail outlined below guides you through considerations and tips intended to help you and your familyâand your walletâto be healthy.</p>
<p><a name="healthyhike"></a></p>
<h2>The Healthy Hike</h2>
<p><img alt="The Healthy Hike" src="/content/dam/concordia/services/hr/images/roadtohealth.gif"></p>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open The new-U turn: A healthy life begins with you">
					
                    The new-U turn: A healthy life begins with you
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Whoever said we had to wait until New Yearâs to make our annual resolution to be healthier? You decide whenâand ifâyou want to get back into shape.</p>
<p>Here are some tips that may be just the ticket you need to improve your well-being.</p>
<ul>
<li><h5>Call the Health Assistance line</h5>
When you need expert health advice, the Health Assistance line can provide access to valuable information. This confidential telephone service is available 24 hours a day, immediately connecting you and your insured dependents with experienced health care professionals.<br>
<br>
Improve your quality of life with information on:</li>
</ul>
<ul>
<table>
<tbody><tr><td>Health</td>
<td>Immunization</td>
</tr><tr><td>Nutrition</td>
<td>Lifestyle</td>
</tr><tr><td>Physical fitness - Child care &nbsp;&nbsp;</td>
<td>Local resources</td>
</tr></tbody></table>
<br>
<br>
<p>Health assistance is meant to complement medical consultations and emergency medical services. It is not intended to replace your regular health care provider or emergency medical services.</p>
<p>You can contact Health Assistance at any time:</p>
<table>
<tbody><tr><td class="th-blue"><b>If you are calling from ...</b></td>
<td class="th-blue"><b>Dial ...</b></td>
</tr><tr><td>Montreal area</td>
<td>(514) 875-2632</td>
</tr><tr><td>Elsewhere in Canada</td>
<td>1 877 875-2632 (toll-free)</td>
</tr></tbody></table>
</ul>
<ul>
<li><h5>Pay yourself first</h5>
Thereâs a golden rule in financial planning that says you should pay yourself first, that is, save before you spend. The same can be said for your health: pay attention to yourself first, before you turn to all the deadlines, errands, commitments and other responsibilities that shape your life.</li>
<li><h5>Eat healthy</h5>
Check out Health Canadaâs <a href="http://www.hc-sc.gc.ca/fn-an/food-guide-aliment/index-eng.php" target="_blank">Healthy Food Guide</a> to eating well.</li>
<li><h5>Get regular medical check-ups</h5>
No more procrastination. Prevention is indeed the best medicine.</li>
<li><h5>Relax</h5>
If you do all of the items listed above, you should be able to overcome stress quite easily. Depending on your eligibility group, the University also provides the Employee Assistance Program (EAP) to help resolve personal problems. For details, consult Benefits Services (intranet - Cspace).</li>
<li><h5>Kick the smoking habit</h5>
Hereâs a great example of how kicking a habit can add years to your life â¦ and money in your wallet! If you participate in the <a adhocenable="false" href="/hr/benefits/health.html">Concordia Health Plan</a>, did you know that smoking-cessation drugs are covered up to certain limits?<br>
<br>
Next stop? Go straight to <b>Low-Dollar Valley</b>. Or, take a short detour and learn more about your Health Canadaâs <a href="http://www.hc-sc.gc.ca/fn-an/food-guide-aliment/index-eng.php" target="_blank">Healthy Food Guide</a> and <a href="http://www.phac-aspc.gc.ca/hp-ps/hl-mvs/pa-ap/index-eng.php" target="_blank">Physical Activity Guide</a>.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Low-dollar Valley: Get the most for your money">
					
                    Low-dollar Valley: Get the most for your money
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ol>
<li>Ask the hospital to send the bill for all expenses not covered by your provincial health plan to <a target="_blank" href="http://www.desjardinslifeinsurance.com/en/Pages/home.aspx">Desjardins Financial Security</a>, or you can submit the claim yourself.</li>
<li>Desjardins Financial Security will reimburse the hospital for all eligible expenses, according to the applicable percentage of reimbursement.</li>
<li>You must pay the hospital directly for all expenses not eligible for reimbursement.</li>
</ol>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Owl Creek: More wisdom for optimal health and savings ">
					
                    Owl Creek: More wisdom for optimal health and savings 
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ol>
<li>For all eligible expenses not submitted electronically, keep all receipts for the medical expenses of each covered individual.</li>
<li>Once the accumulated expenses exceed the deductible, complete a <i>Desjardins Financial Security claim form. </i></li>
<li>Complete the form, attach the original receipts, and send everything to Desjardins Financial Security, at the following address:<br>
&nbsp;<br>
Desjardins Financial Security<br>
Dental and Health Claims<br>
P.O. Box 3950<br>
LÃ©vis, QC G6V 8C6<br>
&nbsp;<br>
Eligible expenses for you and your dependents will be reimbursed directly to you.</li>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Conversion privileges</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>When your employment ends or you begin to receive your pension (or, if earlier, on June 1 coinciding with or following your normal retirement date), you may convert the following amounts to an individual insurance policy, at standard rates:</p>
<ul>
<li><b>For yourself:</b> The coverage that you will lose under the plans when you leave the University or retire, up to $200,000.</li>
<li><b>For your spouse:</b> The coverage that your spouse will lose under the Optional Dependent Life Insurance Plan when you leave the University or retire, up to $100,000</li>
</ul>
<p>You have 31 days to initiate the process and pay the required premium.</p>
<p>You and your spouse are not required to provide proof of good health if you purchase the individual policy from Sun Life. However, if you do provide such proof, you may benefit from better rates and terms of coverage.</p>
<p>If you or your spouse dies within the 31-day conversion period, the insurance that could have been converted wil be paid to the designated beneficiary, whether or not an application for conversion was made.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>

                <div class="parsys sidebar">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
